-- | A Book of Abstract Algebra
--   
--   Working through <a>exercises</a> in <a>"A Book of Abstract Algebra" by
--   Charles C. Pinter</a>.
@package pinter
@version 0.6.0

module Pinter.Ch03.CoinGame
data Move

-- | Flip over the coin at A.
M1 :: Move

-- | Flip over the coin at B.
M2 :: Move

-- | Flip over both coins.
M3 :: Move

-- | Switch the coins.
M4 :: Move

-- | Flip coin at A; then switch.
M5 :: Move

-- | Flip coin at B; then switch.
M6 :: Move

-- | Flip both coins; then switch.
M7 :: Move

-- | Do not change anything.
I :: Move
runMove :: Move -> (Bool, Bool) -> (Bool, Bool)
instance GHC.Show.Show Pinter.Ch03.CoinGame.Move
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Pinter.Ch03.CoinGame.Move
instance GHC.Base.Semigroup Pinter.Ch03.CoinGame.Move
instance GHC.Base.Monoid Pinter.Ch03.CoinGame.Move
instance Data.Group.Group Pinter.Ch03.CoinGame.Move
